name: Not Home Alone
description:
A game where you are a kid that's locked outdoor and tries to reach his shelter in the tree. Be clever and use everything you have to get up there ! 

Controls: WASD / Left Joystick: Move 

Mouse / Right Joystick: Turn camera

 Space / A Button: Jump 

F / B Button: Pickup 

E / X Button: Roll in your sheet (in-air only) 

Be careful about the fire !
